parameters.name: AccountDescription
parameters.description:
The description of the account.

*   It cannot start with http:// or https://.
*   It must start with a letter.
*   It must be 2 to 256 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The name of the account for which you want to modify the description.
